startedAt.description: When response started filling up in the app (iso 8601)

submittedAt.description: When response was submitted in the app (iso 8601)

answers.description:
A list of coded answers

What did you investigate?

- 501 - Logging

- 502 - Poaching

- 503 - Other

What logging evidence did you encounter?

- 100 - None

- 101 - Cut down trees

- 102 - Cleared areas

- 103 - Logging equipment

- 104 - Loggers at site

- 105 - Illegal camps

- 106 - Fired/burned areas

- 107 - Evidence of poaching

- 108 - Other

What actions were taken? Select all that apply

- 200 - None

- 201 - Collected evidence

- 202 - Issue a warning

- 203 - Confiscated equipment

- 204 - Issue a fine

- 205 - Arrests

- 206 - Planning to come back with security enforcement

- 207 - Other

- 208 - Damaged machinery

What was the scale of logging operation?

- 301 - None

- 302 - Not sure

- 303 - Small

- 304 - Large

How much damage was done to the area?

- 401 - No visible tree disruption found

- 402 - Small number of trees cut down

- 403 - Medium number of trees cut down

- 404 - Large area substantially clear cut

What poaching evidence did you encounter? Select all that apply

- 601 - Bullet shells / gun remains

- 602 - Footprints (human)

- 603 - Dog tracks

- 604 - Other

- 605 - None

What was the scale of poaching operation?

- 701 - Small (individual, informal)

- 702 - Large (group, coordinated)

- 703 - None

streamId.description: A stream id from which the event was received
